text: Hi, I  recently redesigned my website using Franklin and my plan is to include a blog in it. Could you point me to some examples of blogs made with Franklin, preferably with the source available? Maybe I find a workflow that I find more suitable to me.

elements.text: Hi, I  recently redesigned my website using Franklin and my plan is to include a blog in it. Could you point me to some examples of blogs made with Franklin, preferably with the source available? Maybe I find a workflow that I find more suitable to me.

text:
the julialang website is probably a good start, cormullion’s website too both have open source repos

<https://github.com/JuliaLang/www.julialang.org>

<https://github.com/cormullion/cormullion.github.io>

elements.text: the julialang website is probably a good start, cormullion’s website too both have open source repos

text: the only thing you’ll  need to dig into is the `hfun_*` that generates the list of blog posts: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/www.julialang.org/blob/b0d59475df65a2f426b363ecfc6358bdf0cf949f/utils.jl#L48-L84>

elements.text: the only thing you’ll  need to dig into is the
that generates the list of blog posts:

text: Thanks, these are great sources of inspiration, for sure!

elements.text: Thanks, these are great sources of inspiration, for sure!

text: I also noticed Tom Kwong's new website <https://ahsmart.com/pub/juliacon2020/|https://ahsmart.com/pub/juliacon2020/> He has a space at the end for comments and reactions, but I understand Franklin is a static site builder, so it seems there is this Disqus that handles this externally somehow and Franklin simply loads that, right? I can ask him about it, but please let me know if you have other sources of information about this integration.

elements.text: I also noticed Tom Kwong's new website

He has a space at the end for comments and reactions, but I understand Franklin is a static site builder, so it seems there is this Disqus that handles this externally somehow and Franklin simply loads that, right? I can ask him about it, but please let me know if you have other sources of information about this integration.
